instructions_checklist.title: Kitchen
instructions_checklist.text: load dishwasher, wipe all surfaces, and clean sink.

instructions_checklist.title: Bathroom
instructions_checklist.text: Clean toilet, shower, tub and sink.

instructions_checklist.title: Floors
instructions_checklist.text: vacuum carpets; sweep and mop hard surfaces.

instructions_checklist.title: Ceilings
instructions_checklist.text: Cobwebs, all the jazz... Measure the corners, they have to be 90 degrees!

instructions_checklist.title: General
instructions_checklist.text: Dust all surfaces, wipe mirrors, and remove garbage.
